languages.text: {n}Лицо девушки, видное из-под полумаски, делается бледным словно мрамор. Она кидает на мужчину в сюртуке мстительный взгляд, затем опускает глаза. Мужчина с облегчением выдыхает:{/n} "Спасибо вам. Я знал, что Звездн{mf|ого|ую} Госпо{mf|дина|жу} не обмануть интригами".

{n}The young woman's face turns pale as marble behind her half-mask. She casts a seething look at the man in the jacket, then lowers her eyes. The man, meanwhile, sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо девушки, видное из-под полумаски, делается бледным словно мрамор. Она кидает на мужчину в сюртуке мстительный взгляд, затем опускает глаза. Мужчина с облегчением выдыхает:{/n} "Спасибо вам. Я знал, что Звездн{mf|ого|ую} Госпо{mf|дина|жу} не обмануть интригами".

{n}The young woman's face turns pale as marble behind her half-mask. She casts a seething look at the man in the jacket, then lowers her eyes. The man, meanwhile, sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

{n}The young woman's face turns pale as marble behind her half-mask. She casts a seething look at the man in the jacket, then lowers her eyes. The man, meanwhile, sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

languages.text: {n}年轻女子半掩面具之下的脸变得惨白，仿佛大理石一般。她怒不可遏地瞪了那个穿着夹克的老人一眼，随后垂下了眼睛。与此同时，老人松了口气，开了口。{/n}“谢谢您，来自上界的大人，我就知道一切诡计都瞒不过您的眼睛。”
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's face turns pale as marble behind her half-mask. She casts a seething look at the man in the jacket, then lowers her eyes. The man, meanwhile, sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻女子半掩面具之下的脸变得惨白，仿佛大理石一般。她怒不可遏地瞪了那个穿着夹克的老人一眼，随后垂下了眼睛。与此同时，老人松了口气，开了口。{/n}“谢谢您，来自上界的大人，我就知道一切诡计都瞒不过您的眼睛。”

languages.text: {n}その若い女性の顔は、半面の仮面の下で大理石のように真っ青になった。彼女は上着を着た男に怒りを燃やすような視線を向け、その後、目を伏せた。男性は安堵の息をつき、こう言った。{/n}「ありがとうございました。どんな陰謀も、天の{mf|君|姫}を欺くことはできないと信じておりました」
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's face turns pale as marble behind her half-mask. She casts a seething look at the man in the jacket, then lowers her eyes. The man, meanwhile, sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}その若い女性の顔は、半面の仮面の下で大理石のように真っ青になった。彼女は上着を着た男に怒りを燃やすような視線を向け、その後、目を伏せた。男性は安堵の息をつき、こう言った。{/n}「ありがとうございました。どんな陰謀も、天の{mf|君|姫}を欺くことはできないと信じておりました」

languages.text: {n}El rostro de la muchacha se torna blanco como el mármol detrás de su media máscara. Mira con rabia al hombre enchaquetado, y luego baja la mirada. El hombre, entre tanto, suspira aliviado y dice:{/n} «Gracias. Sabía que mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial no se dejaría engañar por semejante argucia».
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's face turns pale as marble behind her half-mask. She casts a seething look at the man in the jacket, then lowers her eyes. The man, meanwhile, sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de la muchacha se torna blanco como el mármol detrás de su media máscara. Mira con rabia al hombre enchaquetado, y luego baja la mirada. El hombre, entre tanto, suspira aliviado y dice:{/n} «Gracias. Sabía que mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial no se dejaría engañar por semejante argucia».

languages.text: {n}Genç kadının yüzü, yarı maskesinin ardında mermer gibi bembeyaz kesiliyor. Ceketli adama kızgın bir bakış atıp sonrasında gözlerini indiriyor. Bu arada adam rahat bir nefes alıp konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Semavi {mf|Lordumuzu|Leydimizi} hiçbir entrikanın kandıramayacağını biliyordum."
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's face turns pale as marble behind her half-mask. She casts a seething look at the man in the jacket, then lowers her eyes. The man, meanwhile, sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Genç kadının yüzü, yarı maskesinin ardında mermer gibi bembeyaz kesiliyor. Ceketli adama kızgın bir bakış atıp sonrasında gözlerini indiriyor. Bu arada adam rahat bir nefes alıp konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Semavi {mf|Lordumuzu|Leydimizi} hiçbir entrikanın kandıramayacağını biliyordum."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de la jeune femme devient blanc comme un linge derrière son demi-masque. Elle lance un regard incendiaire à l'homme en pourpoint, puis baisse les yeux. Celui-ci laisse échapper un soupir de soulagement :{/n} « Merci. Je savais que nulle intrigue ne pourrait tromper Votre Céleste Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's face turns pale as marble behind her half-mask. She casts a seething look at the man in the jacket, then lowers her eyes. The man, meanwhile, sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de la jeune femme devient blanc comme un linge derrière son demi-masque. Elle lance un regard incendiaire à l'homme en pourpoint, puis baisse les yeux. Celui-ci laisse échapper un soupir de soulagement :{/n} « Merci. Je savais que nulle intrigue ne pourrait tromper Votre Céleste Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Das Gesicht der jungen Frau wird hinter ihrer Halbmaske bleich wie Marmor. Sie wirft dem Mann in der Jacke einen wütenden Blick zu und senkt dann die Augen. Der Mann hingegen seufzt erleichtert und sagt:{/n} "Danke. Ich wusste, dass keine Intrige {mf|den himmlischen Herrn|die himmlische Herrin} täuschen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's face turns pale as marble behind her half-mask. She casts a seething look at the man in the jacket, then lowers her eyes. The man, meanwhile, sighs with relief and says,{/n} "Thank you. I knew that no intrigue could fool the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

Der Mann hingegen seufzt erleichtert und sagt:{/n} "Danke. Ich wusste, dass keine Intrige {mf|den himmlischen Herrn|die himmlische Herrin} täuschen kann."
